about_the_game:
GAMEPLAY & FEATURES


  • Medium-length visual novel with 10+ hours till credits
  • ’20 Pink Moe Game Award-winning series with its own anime
  • Animated character sprites and NVIDIA image scaling (NIS) option
  • Star-studded cast of professional Japanese voice talent

STORY

First kiss, first date, first real relationship... When you truly love someone, surely it’s only normal to want to share in all of their romantic first times, too?

My name is Shun, and I’m in a real anime situation. I can’t stop triggering romance flags only to crush them—in real life! My big sister, Mio, even calls it Flag Crush Syndrome.

“I wanna play the leading lady in all of your first times, Shun. Your first real romance, starring me!”

Then my classmate Ena drops this bombshell on me. I tried to warn her, but she suggested we test the curse out and see how far we can go... and I found myself hopeful for the first time in a while. When word got out, however, my childhood friend Hinano and even Ayane, who’s like a second sister to me, confessed they had a thing for me, too, turning my life around overnight!

I might be new to all things romance, but these babes are keen to go to war with each other... in a battle for my heart! That’s right, my “real anime situation” is about as ridiculously real as it gets!

CHARACTERS



Ena Yuzuriha
Suyako Inemuri

Sweetheart Turned Grand Romantic

A classmate who flipped Shun’s world upside down after offering to take his “romance virginity.”

Witnessed Shun’s love flags implode time and again, although they’d never talked. While she always played it cool, however, his lonely gaze struck a chord with her...

When she caught wind of Shun’s yearning for romance, she decided to take matters into her own hands.

“I’m gonna take all of your firsts. Your romance virginity is mine!”


Hinano Kasama
Musubi Aono

Conflicted, Possessive Childhood Friend

Shun’s classmate and constant companion since day one. Despite their shared history, romantic feelings never surfaced between them—until now.

It turns out her aloof demeanor was a carefully crafted facade, hiding a deeper desire to transition from friend to something more.

“It’s been so long! Such a long, long time since I fell in love with you!”


Ayane Anekawa
Ayaka Igasaki

Doting But Demanding Girl-Next-Door

A friend of Mio who’s like an older sibling to Shun, sharing a stronger bond with him than he has with his actual sister.

Like Hinano, she knows the ins and outs of his flag-crush curse, biding her time while dropping not-so-subtle hints from her advantageous position as a trusted family friend.

“Go ahead, I’m like family! You can come to me for anything, Shun...”

content_descriptors.notes: Contains occasional crude humor, crass language, and sexual innuendo. All characters are 18 years of age or older.

name: Real Anime Situation! DT

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit / Windows 11 (Three-finger function not available due to conflicts with OS gestures.)
  • Processor: Intel / Intel Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 620 (Kaby Lake, integrated GPU) or later, or Nvidia GeForce GT 1030 or later, or AMD Radeon Pro 555 or later
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 17 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Using the Super Resolution feature may cause a decrease in frame rate due to high load. Requires pointing device (mouse, trackpad, etc.) and display capable of full-color representation.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Additional Notes: 1280x720p or higher recommended. Compatibility with virtual drives and Virtual PC (including Apple Boot Camp) not guaranteed.

short_description: I’m Shun, and I have a talent for crushing romance flags—in real life! Featuring even more eye-popping art, nuanced animations, plus a fresh-faced cast of DT-obsessed heroines, this Moe Game Awards-winning comedy franchise also received its own hit anime adaptation.
